newsitem.title: GREECE: IONIAN BANK OFFERS PERSONAL LOANS FOR OTE SHARES.
newsitem.headline: IONIAN BANK OFFERS PERSONAL LOANS FOR OTE SHARES.

text.p: Ionian Bank said on Friday that personal loans up to 1.0 million drachmas at a rate of 16.5 percent will be available to clients who wish to acquire shares of OTE telecom .
Loan approvals will be granted when clients subscribe to OTE's public offering in any of Ionian's 225 branches. The shares will be held by the bank as security against the loan until it is paid off.

Subscriptions for OTE's public offering will take place during June 11-13. An indicative price range for the shares will be announced late on June 10. --George Georgiopoulos, Athens Newsroom +301 3311812-4
